      • getStatesConfig

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getStatesConfig()
        Description copied from interface: StateEngineConfiguration
        Get the state configurations. This is a map from state name to state configuration object. The configuration object can be String or a State instance. This loaded by StateEngineLoader
        Specified by:
        getStatesConfig in interface StateEngineConfiguration
        Returns:
        the state configurations

      • getTransitionsConfig

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object[]>> getTransitionsConfig()
        Description copied from interface: StateEngineConfiguration
        Get the transition configurations. This is a 2-level map from state name to state transitions. The second level map key indicates the action that triggers the state change. And the value indicates a transition list. Usually if the transition is string, it will be converted to SimpleStateTransition
        Specified by:
        getTransitionsConfig in interface StateEngineConfiguration
        Returns:
